metadata.title: CVE-2016-2156 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: calendar/externallib.php in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.13,2.8.x before 2.8.11, 2.9.x before 2.9.5, and 3.0.x before 3.0.3 providescalendar-event data without considering whether an activity is hidden,which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information viaa web-service request.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
